itunes:summary: Meet Paralympic Hopeful Brandon Lyons. The accomplished para cyclist walks Sasha through the tragic accident that left him paralyzed from the waist down while on vacation with friends. Brandon explains how fostering his positive attitude and goal setting ultimately led him to hand cycling and the Paralympic movement. Brandon is on track to qualify for his first Paralympic Games this summer in Tokyo.
